content.description: Climb through some thoughtful movement on a variety of pockets. Work your way through a very small roof about 2/3 up the route. Technical, a bit pumpy, and pretty fun!
content.location: On the right-ish side of the DMZ, find a 4' boulder to start the route on. It appears (from the picture in the guidebook) that the boulder in under water in the spring/early summer, so bring a raft to belay from. There was no water in early September.

content.description: Stick clip the second bolt from standing on top of the large rock. Most people yard up to the second bolt and just climb it as an 11a route but there is the option to climb from the bottom for a harder variation at about 12a. Either way the climbing is pretty good on bomber stone.Â
content.location: Second route left of Hucky Sucky, this starts on top of the large boulder.

content.description: Fantastic route with good moves the whole way. Crux moves right off the bat getting past the first bolt (attentive belay/spot important) and a couple moves that make you think up higher around the 8th bolt. As the guidebook says "when in doubt go left." Perfect side pulls, pockets, and crimps. Get on it! (***watch out for a big chalk "x" around the 10th bolt, theres a good size wasp's nest in that pocket, there wasn't any activity Aug 2013 but keep an eye out***)
content.protection: 12 bolts (book says 13 but theres 12 now, looks like one has been moved/replaced) with open drop in anchors.
content.location: this route is in the middle of the "DMZ" wall. when you get into the canyon with the duck wall on your left (going commie, mock duck) and the china wall on your right (man china, steep and cheap), keep walking for 2-3minutes and hug the right wall. there's some fun stones/cairns sticking out of the right wall in pockets around the "big bend" area. the dmx and hucky sucky are about 100 yards past those.

content.description: Climbs 5 bolts to anchors. Or you can go left at last bolt and join Hucky Sucky 5.10 Bucky to the top.
content.location: Just right of Hucky Sucky 5.10 Bucky

content.description: Great warmups including one of the best 5.10's in the VC (Hucky Sucky 5.10 Bucky). Gets morning shade, then sun, then goes back in the shade.
